title: Tech Stocks Set for Further Losses on Rate-Rise Worries
sub_head: Oil prices and European and Asian stock indexes fall
body:
Stock futures paused, while technology companies looked set for further losses, as investors assessed the potential impact on inflation and growth from policy shifts by the worldâ€™s largest central banks.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 edged down 0.2%, while Dow Jones Industrial Average futures were flat. Nasdaq-100 futures fell 0.7%, suggesting tech firms could fall further, a day after they dragged down broader indexes on concerns about higher interest rates.
